recipe.title: Mint Chip Avocado Ice Cream Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; full-fat coconut milk ; (60 mL)

steps.step: Add the avocados to a blender or food processor, along with honey, coconut milk, peppermint extract and salt.
Blend until smooth, scraping down sides as necessary.
Pour mixture into a freezer-safe dish and fold in the chocolate chunks.
Freeze for at least 2-3 hours. If freezing overnight, allow to defrost for 10-15 minutes for easier scooping.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the avocados to a blender or food processor, along with honey, coconut milk, peppermint extract and salt.
Blend until smooth, scraping down sides as necessary.
Pour mixture into a freezer-safe dish and fold in the chocolate chunks.
If freezing overnight, allow to defrost for 10-15 minutes for easier scooping.
